tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart
type: Adding Charts - Hooking up a Chart to Data Products

definition.text: Get your Time Machine in position.

paragraphs.text: Whew! I am getting a little carried away. My friends will cover these exciting possiblities in a little while. Let's refocus and finish adding those Data Mine Products we've been working on.
Pin and drag your whole Time Machine over to Data Mine Products nodes you found earlier.
Don't forget Ctrl + ← → ↑ ↓. It's a bit of a trek!
